name: CoReSyFDataCubeCreation
description: This tool extract spatial data from a bunch of netCDF files in a folder by bounding box and creates a stacked 3D data cube of grid data.

inputs.name: source
inputs.description: Path to a folder containing the input NetCDF dataset files.

parameters.name: variables
parameters.description: Variables to extract from dataset. String of names separated by comma.

outputs.name: target
outputs.description: Target path for the data cube file.
